details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.1.12 Implementation limits - CID
details.description: A conforming file shall not contain a CID value greater than 65535.

rule.description: A conforming file shall not contain a CID value greater than 65535.

error.message: Maximum value of a CID (65535) is exceeded
